description: This course is taught by specialists including research-active staff and visiting lecturers from relevant fields.Why choose this course?This course is accredited by the Institute of Biomedical Science (IBMS).A staple topic at the University of Wolverhampton for over a quarter of a century, this course is taught by specialists including research-active staff and visiting lecturers from relevant fields.
duration: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
